dd_validate_totals_over_sex_new

Source: R/dd_validate_totals_over_sex_new.R
dd_validate_totals_over_sex_new.Rd

Compute total over sex as max of reported total or sum over sex, compute any NA values based on differences and redistribute SexID = 0 across males and females

dd_validate_totals_over_sex_new(data)

Arguments

data

Data to be harmonized

Value

A dataset where Both sexes == Female + Male
